body_text:
Hi @Harish Chaduvula <harish.chaduvula@paytm.com>

Please help with the product launch creatives for Vivo V60. Need the same
in 2 adapts ( Basic template and 15th August Template)

https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fo/an4agi9cy7d58934k1osn/AM0_5azxvXDU5z2MKFFPsYA?rlkey=ph8e0jar5ev2rrdgj0txpi6u4&st=8y5pvy3d&dl=0


V60 Main KV:
https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fo/01sr7i36mspt7o5o1f7es/ANR8H5h6RL1hH2rpPxNtt6U?rlkey=ymhsfv7byij2qgftrqsnis6dv&st=dqwggjjv&dl=0

V60 Range KV (Gold & Blue):
https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fo/ax0fbyah60p5x3j9quq2y/AOa94veaggJhLec2kxT4h7U?rlkey=7sgm1zhql0v09ujfa6wk0k19a&st=dld71evz&dl=0

V60 Mobile Angles:
https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fo/w5cfpr1sttcfrjexwygdi/AC8CPiha9PlxKGz6_EzqHsw?rlkey=d2zlzzyg6jegi0zx466rzio7g&st=xdx4661q&dl=0

- No Cost EMI & Low Cost EMI, UPI Offer
- HDFC, IDFC, HSBC, BOB and Axis
- Flat 10% Off
-12 Aug'25 - 31 Aug'25
-3, 6, 9, 12

Creative Type A-  EMI OFFER ( Normal )

- whatsapp,
- Screensaver,
- Emailer,


Creative Type B -  EMI OFFER ( Independence DAY )

- whatsapp,
- Whatsapp CT

Creative Type C -  UPI OFFER ( Independence DAY )

- whatsapp,



*May 2025 surround you with kindness, laughter, and everything that makes
you smile! ?*

*Vanshika Khurana*

- No Cost EMI & Low Cost EMI, UPI Offer
- HDFC, IDFC, HSBC, BOB and Axis
- Flat 10% Off
-12 Aug'25 - 31 Aug'25
-3, 6, 9, 12

Creative Type A-  EMI OFFER ( Normal )

- whatsapp,
- Screensaver,
- Emailer,


Creative Type B -  EMI OFFER ( Independence DAY )

- Whatsapp CT

Creative Type C -  UPI OFFER ( Independence DAY )

- whatsapp,



May 2025 surround you with kindness, laughter, and everything that makes you smile! 🌻

Vanshika Khurana


On Tue, Aug 5, 2025 at 2:09 PM Design Team <support@paytm-designocl.freshdesk.com> wrote:
Dear Vanshika Khurana,

We would like to acknowledge that we have received your request and a ticket has been created.
A support representative will be reviewing your request and will send you a personal response.(usually within 24 hours).

To view the status of the ticket or add comments, please visit
https://paytm-designocl.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/26563

Thank you for your patience.

Sincerely,
Design Team _ Brand Marketing Support Team
